articles.title: Nigeria vs Ghana: It is not the right decision – Siasia criticizes Super Eagles’ squad list - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Former Nigeria striker, Samson Siasia has faulted the Super Eagles 25-man squad list for this month’s 2022 World Cup playoffs against Ghana. Last week, interim coach Austine Eguavoen released the names of those invited for the two-legged games and placed seve…
articles.content:

articles.title: Popular 95-octane petrol hikes to cross $3 mark, with Shell leading at $3.06 per litre - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - The most popular grade of petrol has breached the $3 mark after a series of rapid rises accelerated by the Ukraine crisis. Shell raised its posted price of 95-octane fuel by eight cents to $3.06 per litre on Monday (March 7) morning, following at …

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Covid may turn into endemic disease in Thailand by early July: ministry - The Star Online
articles.description: BANGKOK (The Nation/Asia News Network): The Public Health Ministry reckons the Covid-19 situation will improve enough to be considered an endemic disease by early July, government spokesman Thanakorn Wangboonkongchana (pic) said on Sunday (March 6).
